title: GAS: “Reclaiming Our Time”: Black Women, Resistance, and Rising Inequality: SWS Presidential Lecture
description: Author Adia Harvey Wingfield discusses her SWS presidential lecture published in the June 2019 issue of Gender & Society, “ ‘Reclaiming Our Time’: Black Women, Resistance, and Rising Inequality.”
content:encoded: Author Adia Harvey Wingfield discusses her SWS presidential lecture published in the June 2019 issue of Gender & Society, “ ‘Reclaiming Our Time’: Black Women, Resistance, and Rising Inequality.”
